C

calculateHeightForBlock(LocalTime, LocalTime) - Method in class view.CalendarView
This method calculates the necessary height for a block based on the lesson/break length.Each minute represents a pixel on the schedule.
calculateHeightForFonts(LocalTime, LocalTime) - Method in class view.CalendarView
This method calculates the necessary font for a text inside a lesson.After the initial value is set this method adds 2 units for each hour.
CalendarView - Class in view
This calendar view class generates a view dynamically.Through code, you generate 7 VBoxes that represent the days of the week.On each day you can put lessons that are represented by anchor panes.Every anchor pane contains information about the lesson as well as a color.This view also generates empty blocks for breaks , so you can click on them to add other lessons and to represent hours accurately on the schedule.Every time you change the week the calendar regenerates through the controller method "init calendar".
CalendarView(Model) - Constructor for class view.CalendarView
This is the constructor for the calendar view.You need to pass in the information from the model so the view can be generated based on the data.This constructor initializes all the parameters.
CalendarViewController - Class in controller
The purpose of this class is used to initialize the UI elements of CalendarView.fxml
CalendarViewController() - Constructor for class controller.CalendarViewController
 
canBeBookedAt(BookingTime) - Method in class model.rooms.Room
The purpose of this method is to check if a room is free during a given time interval
cancel() - Method in class controller.CreateSemesterViewController
The purpose of this method is to open up the Main Menu window
ClassList - Class in model.courses
The purpose of this class is to store a list of ClassOfStudents objects in order to manage them

The purpose of the constructor is to initialize the classList ArrayList
ClassListViewController - Class in controller
The purpose of this class is used to initialize the UI elements of ClassListView.fxml
ClassListViewController() - Constructor for class controller.ClassListViewController
 
ClassOfStudents - Class in model.courses
The purpose of this class is to store a Student List alongside with a name in order to create a class of students
ClassOfStudents(String) - Constructor for class model.courses.ClassOfStudents
The purpose of this constructor is to initialize the value for the name and create a new StudentList object
ClassOfStudents(String, StudentList) - Constructor for class model.courses.ClassOfStudents
The purpose of this constructor is to initialize values for the name and the student list
closeView() - Method in class view.ViewHandler
Closes the stage.
collideWith(BookingTime) - Method in class model.rooms.BookingTime
The purpose of this method is to check if it is possible to book a room in a given time interval
confirm() - Method in class controller.CreateSemesterViewController
The purpose of this method is to open up the Main Menu window
controller - package controller
 
CopiedWeek - Class in model.calendar
This class is a representation of a copied week used to copy weeks around the schedule.

copyDays() - Method in class model.calendar.Week
Returns the cloned day array.
copyLessons(LocalDate) - Method in class model.calendar.Day
 
copyWeek() - Method in class controller.CalendarViewController
The purpose of this method is to copy a week
Course - Class in model.courses
The purpose of this class is to store a title, a teacherList, a classOfStudents participants and a hexColor in order to create a course
Course(String, ArrayList<Teacher>) - Constructor for class model.courses.Course
The purpose os this constructor is to initialize the title and a teacherList and create a null object of classOfStudents
Course(String, ArrayList<Teacher>, ClassOfStudents) - Constructor for class model.courses.Course
The purpose os this constructor is to initialize the title, a class of students and create a new TeacherList object

The purpose of this method is to create a Combo box from where u can choose a class
